summary: A money troubled man finds some cash in an apartment which later turns out to belong to someone who stops at nothing to get his money back.
cast: Nickola Shreli|Brandon Trammer|Stivi Paskoski|Danijela Stajnfeld|Malik Bader|Herion Mustafaraj|Ele Bardha|Maia Noni|Christian Mathis|Sazan Bardha|Djelina Berishaj|Arian Camaj|Kyle Clarington|Luigi Gjokaj|Richard Goteri|Michael Mili|Ava Simony|Nellie Smydra|Janae Stinson|Giancarlo Evola
title: Cash Only
